  sv = tf.train.Supervisor(
      saver=saver,
      save_model_secs=model_params['checkpoint_interval'],
      save_summaries_secs=model_params['report_interval'],
      init_op=init_op,
      logdir=model_params['checkpoint_dir'])

  with sv.managed_session(config=session_config) as sess:

body:
Built from head (dbb78c7783c32f8f3dc86364dc10d7d51cf61277), this does not seem to work for me. 


```
  session_config=tf.ConfigProto(
          allow_soft_placement=True,
          log_device_placement=False)
  # session_config.gpu_options.allow_growth = True
  session_config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction = 0.40

  saver = tf.train.Saver(
      max_to_keep=50,
      write_version=2 ,
      sharded=True,)

  init_op = tf.global_variables_initializer()
  sv = tf.train.Supervisor(
      saver=saver,
      save_model_secs=model_params['checkpoint_interval'],
      save_summaries_secs=model_params['report_interval'],
      init_op=init_op,
      logdir=model_params['checkpoint_dir'])

  with sv.managed_session(config=session_config) as sess:

```

[1] TITAN X (Pascal) | 54'C,  22 % | 11672 / 12189 MB | asher(11117M)

The above worked previously, but please let me know if I've missed a change.
